en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Hussain Al-Suwaidi, Champion U.A.E Bowler.

 
I played very good when I wear FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. It gives me better focus, balance and energy, so I can play longer. I am very happy and I wish everyone to get that too.

HUSSAIN AL-SUWAIDI ACHIEVEMENTS:

- Ranked Number 1 in Asia.
- 5th Kuwait Open - 4th Position.
- ABF Tour Kuwait - 2nd Position.
- Dubai Open - 2nd Position.
- 41st Singapore Open - Winner.
- 20th Asian Championship (All Events) - 3rd Position.
